summary: This memorandum discusses The Wackenhut Corporation and its potential for cover support. It details a meeting between a CIA representative and George Wackenhut, President of the company, along with Wes Reynolds. The memorandum outlines Wackenhut's services, international expansion plans, and potential applications to Agency problems.
title: The Wackenhut Corporation
origin_agency: Central Cover Staff, Nonofficial Cover Branch
sender: Chief, Central Cover Staff, Nonofficial Cover Branch
